attributes.action: Allow vocational course exams to be cancelled and give students predicted grades
attributes.background: It is unfair for schools to decide to do exams or not. All vocational exams must be cancelled

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Allow teachers to give 'Access' students predicted grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567365

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
